extendedInfo.description: The hit online game Globs is finally available for Android. Match colors to merge Globs and get big points. Over 70 million people have enjoyed the online version and now you can play Globs on the go. With new graphics, music, and a Time Mode there is more globby fun than ever before.

reviews.title: Addicting/flawless/fun
reviews.comment: This is the reason to own a real Android phone. Meaning stop buying phones with TouchWiz, Sense, Optimus, Blur etc etc. Works perfect on my Nexus 4 and Nexus 7. Before getting a real Android, it was always hit and miss, but now that I\'ve (permanently) switched to REAL Android, it\'s a completely different world. A world were things just work. (Insert cheesy music here) This phone is amazing! I gave  up my glitch ridden 1X+ & 1X and so glad I did.
reviews.author: Michael W

reviews.title: Whyyyyyyy?
reviews.comment: It just doesn\'t work. None of the controls! Sooo frustating.
reviews.author: Keren Moore

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time
reviews.comment: Only works one time then freezes.  I love this game but the app needs lots of improving.  Will uninstall for now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUCKS!
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time..You only get to play once and after that it stays frozen (Locked) So it makes you Wana buy the paid version..DONT DO IT, WASTE!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugh
reviews.comment: Has potential The game is fun, potentially addictive. But the app freezes ALL THE TIME on my DroidX. The paid version also freezes up my Nook. 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: Was a good game until it started freezing on my HTC Evo 3D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: omgg
reviews.comment: itss so funnn love it maybe ot dosent worsks in some phones but at the others is perfectt\342\231\245
reviews.author: Hana Xhaferi
